text: my understanding was that it only affected machines on Hyper-V hosts. do you have links / references that suggest otherwise? If so I'd be appreciative of seeing them - we're running vcenter 8.01 on ESXi 7.x hosts I did find some mention of issues but it was referenced back to this article which doesn't affect ESXi 8 hosts (and we're above that version of ESXi 7) https://kb.vmware.com/s/article/90947
